name: Apartment Complex
description:
Warning - Flashing Images

APARTMENT COMPLEX

A short point-and-click / visual novel type of game which takes place during the early hours after a heavy night.

Suggested for ages 13+ (some allusions to drinking)

---------

Synopsis Try to get back to your room and get some sleep!

It sounds like a great plan. And you really should try to get a few hours in bed before your dad comes to pick you up tomorrow.

The only thing is, you have lost your phone and wallet! Oh no! O_O

And you can't understand the keycard you have for your room...

----------

It's about 1.5k words, maybe 10-25 minutes.

Spoiler (sort of / not really):

There is 1 real ending and a couple of special items which you might find!

Notes

Made for SuNoFes 2016

By Sleepy Agents

Feedback is very much appreciated!


Credits:

Story, Art, Music, Coding by Sleepy Agents

(aka paradigmshifty)

@sleepyagents

Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine: renpy.org

With special thanks to Lemmasoft Forum, qualifiedbadger, adirosa

Additional credits for fonts are in game.


This is a free game, but I've enabled PWYW in case anybody would like to help support future Sleepy Agents games which is where all proceeds will go! Except for 20% which goes to itch.io because they are great and deserve every penny :D
